about_the_game:
Dr. Agatha Molla, a cardiothoracic surgeon, believes the human body is beautiful. Follow her story as she finds the most beautiful specimen of them all. Amare Inversus is a psychological thriller that blurs the lines between love, lust, and obsession, leaving the audience with an unforgettable otome game.

This was originally a submission for the 2023 Otome Jam.

Features:

  • A strong female protagonist who is not afraid to dirty her hands.
  • Two endings, two victims.
  • Activate Streamer Friendly/SFW Mode in settings! Disables sexual visuals and some dialogue. Violence is unaltered.
  • 14k words and 10 unique CGs!
  • Situs Inversus! Isn't it beautiful? So, so beautiful...



Director: Thugzilladev
Background Artist: Eibmoz
Character Artist: Kutapika
Russian Translation: ghost_cat00

content_descriptors.notes: Contains graphic surgical procedures, violence, sexual harassment, nudity, animal death, hallucinations, and serious Hippocratic violations.
